title: Bones of Rebellion
description: A century has passed since the flood of judgment engulfed mankind. The descendants of Noah live in harmony, unified beneath their tower. One God. One people.Then a man is killed.Naomi's grandson is accused of murder and will be stoned unless she can prove his innocence. A tower of lies conceals the truth. It must be allowed to crumble, exposing long hidden secrets. But some of them are her own...
author: Rachel S. Neal
